title: Falling Fast
description: Fans of Meg Cabot, Sophie Kinsella & Carly Phillips will enjoy this fun contemporary romance for teens and adult readers by bestselling author Lucy Kevin.When Alexa is sent by a magazine to be an undercover contestant on the reality TV series "Falling For Mr. Right" she assumes the worst part of the assignment will be having to act like a brainless bimbo to win the affection of an arrogant guy out looking for his fifteen minutes of fame. Color her shocked when it turns out not only are several of her fellow contestants intelligent, funny women...but Brandon – aka Mr. Right - isn't at all the kind of guy she thought he'd be.Now what's Alexa supposed to do when instead of digging up dirt for her cover story, she finds herself falling way too fast for the guy she’s supposed to tear apart in her first big feature story?
author: Lucy Kevin
